comments:
This doesn't happen all the time, but it does happen more often when making two changes quickly.

This error is recoverable.

This bug exists conditionally as a result of the fix for bug 191301.

This occurs as a result of the *initial* fix for bug 191301, but does not occur as of now.

Since that patch has not been applied, this bug only occurs in a "non" stream of Dali, so marking as invalid.
